name: A My Pet Puppy Dog Racer Game
name_original: A My Pet Puppy Dog Racer Game
description:
Race your way to the finish line with Pet Puppy and join the bandwagon of adventure seekers!

Hop and skip and do some crazy moves as Pet Puppy races its way to win the game. Collect those coins as treats and be rewarded at the end of the race. This simple and fun game will definitely release your stress for the day and make your day a happy one.

What are you waiting for? Grab the game now!

Game Features:
> Cute puppy character
> Easy control and navigation
> Fun and cute game for all
